name: 'Birds Are Real' - Brackeys 2022.1 submission
description:
This was made in a week (that's also a week in bird time) for the Brackeys 2022.1 Jam.

Credits:

Peppsen - Audio and Audio integration (pettersumelius.com)

Macauley Bell - 3d bird and animations (artstation.com/maclawly)

Daniel Mendez - Programming (play.google.com/store/apps/developer?id=Daniel+Bne)

A. J. J McClenaghan - Design and Programming (ajjmcc.itch.io)

The polyperfect pack was used for environment assets.
